Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus strain 21 (IC90>25 µg/mL), Staphylococcus aureus strain 4 (IC90>80 µg/mL).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Global fold has a N-terminal loop L1, followed by a helix and a two-stranded antiparallel β-sheet forming the CSab motif.
Sequence Information.Function: Responsible for the anti Gram-positive activity of immune hemolymph and proves to be efficient against sensitive
Sequence Information.Comments: strains as against resistant and multi-resistant strains.

Literature.Title: Rational design of peptides active against the gram positive bacteria Staphylococcus aureus.
Literature.Author: Landon C, Barbault F, Legrain M, Guenneugues M, Vovelle F.
